title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the EnergyHarvestingPaint project, including the expected energy harvesting capabilities, environmental conditions, and target applications.

title: Design Energy Harvesting System
description: Design the system architecture and components for harvesting energy from light, heat, and vibrations, including the selection of appropriate materials and technologies. The design should consider the following aspects: scalability, modularity, energy efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and integration with existing infrastructure.

title: Develop Energy Harvesting Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and software components for efficiently harvesting and storing energy from various sources.

title: Design Paint Formulation
description: Develop the formulation and manufacturing process for the energy-harvesting paint, considering factors such as durability, adhesion, compatibility with the energy harvesting system, environmental impact, and scalability of the manufacturing process.
dependencies: Research Energy Harvesting Materials and Technologies

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop a user interface for monitoring and controlling the energy harvesting system, including data visualization and configuration options.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the energy harvesting system and user data from unauthorized access and potential cyber threats.

title: Set up Testing Environment
description: Establish a testing environment and framework for validating the energy harvesting capabilities, paint formulation, and overall system performance under various conditions.

title: Develop Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the EnergyHarvestingPaint project, including user manuals, technical specifications, and maintenance guides.

title: Plan Deployment and Maintenance
description: Develop a deployment strategy and maintenance plan for the EnergyHarvestingPaint system, considering factors such as scalability, updates, and support.

title: Conduct System Integration Testing
description: Perform comprehensive integration testing to ensure the seamless integration of all system components, including the energy harvesting algorithms, paint formulation, user interface, and security measures.
